summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a premium serum for skin brightening and rejuvenation.
usage: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
full_description: Concentration: 10% Vitamin C | Suitable for: Oily, Combination. | Benefits: Brightening, Fades dark spots. | Key ingredients: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid. | How to use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen | Side effects: Mild tingling for sensitive skin
